Best Dog Ball Launchers In 2020

Throwing a ball and having your dog fetch it is one of the most popular activities for dog owners and their companions. It’s great for the dog’s physique, the bonding between the dog and the owner, and it’s simply lots of fun.

However, if your dog seems to always want to play, it won’t be long until you grow tired of the constant ball throwing. Sooner or later you will start wondering: is there any way you can make this task easier for yourself? Perhaps, a dog toy that throws ball on its own? Luckily, there is a solution that will work both for you and your pooch. Check out our list of best dog ball launchers on the market!

Important Features to Consider

Dog’s size

Most dog ball launcher models come with standard tennis ball-sized balls, which should fit the requirements of most medium and large dog breeds. If you have a smaller pooch, consider purchasing a launcher designed specifically for small breeds that is equipped with mini tennis balls for safe play.

Indoor or outdoor

If you are planning to use the dog ball thrower mainly indoors, look for a device with a short shooting range that is completely safe to use in limited spaces. In case most of your fetch sessions will happen in a large backyard or somewhere in nature, there are plenty of outdoor ball throwers to satisfy your pup’s needs.

Distance settings

The most advanced models of ball thrower for dogs come with multiple distance settings, which is a more useful feature than you might think. It allows you to use the same dog ball launcher with multiple pets and change the throwing distance if you want to prevent your pooch from getting bored with repetitive play.

Price

Automatic dog ball launchers are considerably more expensive than their manual counterparts, so the aspect of price is definitely an important one. If you are shopping on a budget, think about the features you can easily live without. Typically, you will pay up to $200, although we don’t recommend buying a launcher that costs under $100 due to quality concerns.

FAQ

  • What is a dog ball launcher?

    An automatic ball thrower is a device that launches dog balls, usually tennis-sized, to a distance between 10 and 30 feet. An automatic launcher is a great way to keep your pup physically active and entertained, maintain a special bond between you and your dog, and help your pooch get over your regular long absences from home.

  • Do dog ball launchers require special balls?

    Most dog ball launchers available in the market today work with tennis-sized balls that can be easily replaced with standard tennis balls once the original ones can no longer be used. However, some models use different sizes of balls or specifically prohibit the owners from using anything other than proprietary balls.

  • How does an automatic dog ball thrower work?

    An automatic ball thrower for dogs shoots a ball to a set distance for your pup to fetch. The ball can then be picked up by the dog and dropped in the launcher to be thrown again. This cycle can be repeated for as long as your dog enjoys it or until the batteries need to be recharged. Most launchers can also be powered by AC.

  • How far do automatic dog ball launchers throw balls?

    The standard distance range available in most dog ball thrower models is between 10 and 30 feet. There are also some outdoor models that can throw the ball up to 50 feet. The best launchers allow you to adjust the settings, so that your pup is not able to predict where the ball will land and is constantly alert.
